BuyerCriteria.name: BuyerCriteria
BuyerCriteria.description: Represents the buyer context qualifier of locale for any buyer groups of type Market

CriteriaKey.description: Required. The label displayed to list supported markets with associated languages and currencies.

CriteriaKeyType.description: Required. Defines the type of key.

CriteriaValue.description: Required. The value of a Locale. For example, fr-FR.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Optional. Three letter ISO currency codes associated with the buyer account record or a locale. Auto populated if MultiCurrency is enabled in org.

Description.description: The supported criteria in this record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the buyer group the criteria apply to.

OwnerId.description: ID of the member group or Admin/Merchandiser .
